Reviews.Title: IP8161 and FD8361 reviewed
Reviews.Author: A. B. Schaffer "handy family man"
Reviews.Content: The 4XEM cameras are Vivotek cameras relabeled.  I bought a Vivotek IP8161 and a 4XEM IP8161 and both are exactly the same in hardware and firmware with the exception of the labeling stamped on the camera body.  Of course I also bought the FD8361.  The review was quick and dirty but hopefully is clear enough.Click on the following link to the 4XEM FD8361 IP camera to read my review and where I have also posted snapshots from both the FD8361 and IP8161 IP camera.4XEM Day/Night Vandal Proof Fixed Dome Network Camera 4X-FD8361 - Network camera - PTZ - outdoor - vandal / weatherproof / tamper-proof - color ( Day&Night; ) - auto iris - vari-focal - audio - 10/100 - DC 12 V / AC 24 VI posted a review for the IP8161 also and it is pretty much the same but I think I tailored it a bit for the IP8161.4XEM 4X-IP8161 Indoor/Outdoor 2 Mega-Pixel H.264 Day/Night POE Network Camera

ProductInfo.Features:
2-megapixel CMOS Sensor
3-8 mm Vari-focal, Auto-iris Lens
Multiple Simultaneous Streams
ePTZ for Data Efficiency
Activity Adaptive Streaming for Dynamic Frame Rate Control
ProductInfo.Name: Vivotek IP8161 2MP, H.264, Day & Night, Fixed Network Camera
